mapinfo.detailsText: Frozen rivers run through the map, forcing players to group their bases on the snow covered islands. Play on Regicide mode for a custom Regent, Abe-no-Seimei.
mapinfo.loadDetails: Frozen rivers run through the map, forcing players to group their bases on the snow covered islands. Play on Regicide Mode for a custom regent, Abe-no-Seimei.
